context: Wayfair Inc. is a e-commerce company for home goods focused on online furniture, decor, and home improvement products. Rebranded to Wayfair. IPO.

competitors.name: Amazon
competitors.notes: Largest online retailer expanding home category

competitors.name: Williams-Sonoma
competitors.notes: Home brands including Pottery Barn, West Elm

competitors.name: Bed Bath & Beyond
competitors.notes: Home goods retailer with growing e-commerce

competitors.name: Target
competitors.notes: Mass retailer with home design focus

competitors.name: Home Depot
competitors.notes: Home improvement with furniture and decor
